title: Amazing Love (Christian Movie)
description:
Amazing Love (Christian Movie)

(Also called Amazing Love: The Story of Hosea)

Amazing Love follows four teens who embark on a weekend camping trip with their youth group leader Stuart and his wife. When an outsider, Ashley, unexpectedly joins the group, the materialistic and self-involved young woman's bad attitude 
leads to a confrontation. Hoping to heal the rift, Stuart shares the story of the Old Testament prophet Hosea. The story of Hosea is the measure of God's love for His stiff necked, rebellious and disloyal people. Now, it's up to the teens to decide if this powerful example of faith and commitment inspires them to open their hearts. 

Posted on special request.

Runtime: 80 mins
Language: English
Year: 2012
Quality: 9/10 
Format: avi format

"Don't ask me what Christ can do for you! He has done all he could. Tell me what you can do for Christ?"
